caption.title: qRT PCR and immunohistochemistry.
caption.p: (A) qRT PCR for CHIKV E1 of feet of mice held at 22°C and 30°C. C57BL/6 mice were infected s.c. in the feet as for Fig 1 and at the indicated times feet were harvested (n = 3 feet from 3 mice per time point and temperature) and CHIKV E1 RNA levels determined by qRT PCR as in Fig 1B. Statistics by t test. (B) Immunohistochemistry as in Fig 1F on mock infected mouse tissues.
